author: stevel
msg: This is documented upfront. Also added some more stuff to the file while I was at it, including a list of platforms ant runs happily on. The implicit message there is 'if it doesnt work, it is your fault :-)'

author: stevel
msg: PR 5025 : Execute still fails when failonerror=false and the error is program not found
I've decoupled the handler for this from failonerror to maximise backwards compatibility, there is now a failIfExecuteFails flag, set to true by default.

author: stevel
msg: Stuck the http task set (get, head, post, setproxy) into the sandbox. All need to move to httpclient for a better user experience, except maybe setproxy which is ready to roll as is.
